attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the PM to introduce a Citizen Bonus for the peolpe of the UK. I suggest that reward cash sums are paid to citizen's every ten years starting at the age of 25. I suggest the first payment would start at £5000.00 and increasing by a further £5000.00 every 10  years. Payments would be made to those who abide by the law's of the UK ( within reason ) maintain good health (ie. self induced illneses would make the payment void ) 
Have been in / are in or have been proven to seek employment. 
This bonus would act as an insentive the the average citezen to maintain a good lifestyle.
It's time to reward the good people of the UK. The workers and those who care for this nation.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
